patthana22.24:4.1: Naatīto nanahetu dhammo paccuppannassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.24:4.2: Naanāgato nanahetu dhammo paccuppannassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.24:4.3: Naatīto nanahetu ca naanāgato nanahetu ca dhammā paccuppannassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.24:5.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe adhipatiyā cha, anantare tīṇi … pe … upanissaye cha … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.24:6.1: Naatītārammaṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.24:7.1: Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe sattarasa, adhipatiyā nava … pe … purejāte āsevane nava … pe … avigate sattarasa.
